autoContrast.description: Determines whether text color should depend on background-color of the indicator. If luminosity of the color prop is less than theme.luminosityThreshold, then theme.white will be used for text color, otherwise theme.black. Overrides theme.autoContrast.
autoContrast.description_zh: 确定文本颜色是否应取决于指示器的 background-color。如果 color 属性的亮度小于 theme.luminosityThreshold，则 theme.white 将用于文本颜色，否则使用 theme.black。覆盖 theme.autoContrast。

color.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color, changes color of indicator, by default color is based on current color scheme
color.description_zh: theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色，更改指示器的颜色，默认情况下颜色基于当前的配色方案

data *.description: Data based on which controls are rendered

disabled.description: Determines whether the component is disabled

fullWidth.description: Determines whether the component should take 100% width of its parent, false by default
fullWidth.description_zh: 确定组件是否应采用其父组件的 100% 宽度，默认为 false

name.description: Name of the radio group, by default random name is generated
name.description_zh: 单选组名称，默认生成随机名称

orientation.description: Determines in which orientation component id displayed, 'horizontal' by default
orientation.description_zh: 确定显示哪个方向组件 ID，默认为 'horizontal'

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, numbers are converted to rem, theme.defaultRadius by default
radius.description_zh: key的 theme.radius 或任何有效的 CSS 值来设置 border-radius，数字默认转换为 rem，theme.defaultRadius

readOnly.description: Determines whether the value can be changed
readOnly.description_zh: 确定是否可以更改该值

size.description: Controls font-size, padding and height properties, 'sm' by default
size.description_zh: 控制字体大小、填充和高度属性，默认为 'sm'

transitionDuration.description: Indicator transition-duration in ms, set 0 to turn off transitions, 200 by default
transitionDuration.description_zh: 指示符 transition-duration 单位为 ms，设置为 0 关闭 transitions，默认为 200

transitionTimingFunction.description: Indicator transition-timing-function property, ease by default
transitionTimingFunction.description_zh: 指标 transition-timing-function 属性，默认缓动

withItemsBorders.description: Determines whether there should be borders between items, true by default
withItemsBorders.description_zh: 确定项目之间是否应有边框，默认为 true
